segments.text: Mary , it was wrong of you to be so late . Mother ’ s very worried .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m so sorry I ’ m late . But Henry ’ s car broke down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t really like Henry . I like my Rose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t like your Rose . And I do love Henry . And I ’ m going to marry him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don ’ t you marry Rose , then ?
segments.speaker: S2
